articles.title: The 10 best movies from this year’s Cannes Film Festival - South China Morning Post
articles.description: From Park Chan-wook’s Decision to Leave to Baz Luhrmann’s Elvis biopic and the controversial Palme d’Or winner Triangle of Sadness, there was much to admire on the Croisette.

articles.author: Janelle Ash
articles.title: Naomi Judd remembered by Wynonna: ‘This cannot be how The Judds story ends’ - Fox News
articles.description: Just about a month after Naomi Judd died by suicide, her daughter, Wynonna Judd, took to Instagram to pay tribute to her life. Wynonna will go on tour later this year.
articles.content:
Just about a month after Wynonna Judds mother, Naomi Judd, died by suicide, the 58-year-old took to Instagram to reflect on life without Naomi.
